original_title: สะบายดี หลวงพะบาง
overview: Sorn, a multiracial photographer, is assigned by his editor to take pictures of Laos, where he’s reluctant to go. Even though, Sorn is half-Laotian, going back to his homeland is never on his mind. Sorn arrives at Pak-Cher town where he hires a guide, Noi to take him out to the best picture spots in Laos.
tagline: When the journey ends. will you be with the one who loves you. or fly to the one you love?
title: Good Morning, Luang Prabang
